website_summaries.verdict: Full-body-size FIR mat with a full-surface combo of healing amethyst, jade, tourmaline.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Functional, Scientific Relief of Discomfort
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable enough to sleep on in my bed. It stays warm, even heated just by my body heat. Sleep better, helps my back feel better. Will post another review after I have had it longer. It has only been a few days. the enclosed instructions are helpful with using the regulator you plug into the mat. You can get your own personal detox sauna by following the instructions! My husband understands the science behind it better than I do. I notice the relief I feel!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Bliss

customer_reviews.title: This mat is great for stiff and sore joints
customer_reviews.text: This mat is great for stiff and sore joints. My wife has arthritis so I purchased this in an attempt to provide her some relief. She loves it. Her only complaint is that she doesn't want to get out of bed once she is warm. Note that the matt doesn't feel very warm to the touch as the heat dissipates quickly. If it is covered with a heavy blanket while warming it holds in heat better. When you lay on it your body will gradually get warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Gunner777

customer_reviews.title: Great Decision
customer_reviews.text: I decided to splurge and buy the HealthyLine Infrared mat and I’m so glad I did. My only complaint is the weight as it’s quite heavy, but I don’t regret my decision one bit. I have fibromyalgia and the benefits from using this have been huge; the physical pain is better and my mood is too. I hope it lasts forever!

customer_reviews.title: Two Mat Styles In One
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. I have owned another of HealthyLine's mats for a few years and my parents had a habit of asking hopefully to use mine when we met up. Buying this one for them was a great gift and investment in a quality of life increase for them. They are able to flip the mat to get the more comfortable granule side for better sleeping on overnight or the disk side to better dig into problem areas like tension knots in their back or hips. While this mat won't fully replace visits to chiropractors and massage therapists, it does reduce the necessary frequency of those visits while maintaining a high-speed heavy-stress lifestyle.
